See the `mergeable` field for more details on the mergeability of the pull request.

fields.description: Indicates whether the viewer can bypass branch protections and merge the pull request immediately

fields.name: viewerCanUpdateBranch
fields.description:
Whether or not the viewer can update the head ref of this PR, by merging or rebasing the base ref.
If the head ref is up to date or unable to be updated by this user, this will return false.

fields.description: Reasons why the current viewer can not update this comment.

fields.description: Did the viewer author this comment.
